preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 70 grams of Aluminum, 20 grams of Lithium, 30 grams of Zirconium, and 10 grams of Aluminum-Copper alloy.
2. Combine all ingredients in a clean, dry mixing container.
3. Use a mechanical stirrer to mix the powders thoroughly for 10 minutes to ensure uniformity.
